title: Minnesota DOR Issues Guidance on Sustainable Aviation Fuel Credit | Tax Notes
description: The Minnesota Department of Revenue released information regarding the refundable aviation fuel tax credit available for fuel sold after June 30, 2024, and before July 1, 2030, for tax years beginning after December 31, 2023. Taxpayers must produce sustainable aviation fuel or blend sustainable aviation fuel with gasoline or jet fuel in order to qualify. Qualifying taxpayers must also apply to the Department of Agriculture for a credit certificate within two months after the end of a taxable year to claim the credit when filing a state tax return.
